channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- spacewalk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- spacewalk

item.title: CVE-2020-1693|2024-08-04T06:46:30.296Z -- red%20hat -- spacewalk
item.description: A flaw was found in Spacewalk up to version 2.9 where it was vulnerable to XML internal entity attacks via the /rpc/api endpoint. An unauthenticated remote attacker could use this flaw to retrieve the content of certain files and trigger a denial of service, or in certain circumstances, execute arbitrary code on the Spacewalk server.
